title: What is this sans-serif?
content:
[http://31.media.tumblr.com/tumblr\_m3vzlroVNU1rvvyydo1\_1280.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317194518/http:/31.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m3vzlroVNU1rvvyydo1_1280.jpg "http://31.media.tumblr.com/tumblr\_m3vzlroVNU1rvvyydo1\_1280.jpg")

Any ideas? The curling ends on the r,s,y, and 2 are stunning, would love to use for a poster project...
author: dawi222
